description: This file defines a utility function 'simulatePing' that emulates network latency and packet loss for testing purposes. It provides configurable options for latency and loss probability, returning a Promise that resolves with a simulated ping result.

methods.name: simulatePing({ minMs = 20, maxMs = 200, lossRate = 0.05 } = {})
methods.description: Emulates network ping with configurable latency and packet loss rate, returning a Promise that resolves with an object containing success status, round-trip time, and status text.
